select pm.id, pm.pdt_name, pm.pdt_price, pim.save_name, pm_cnt.product_total_count from pdt_mst pm left outer join pdt_image_mst pim on(pim.pdt_id = pm.id) left outer join ( select count(*) product_total_count from pdt_mst where 1 = 1
and category_id = (select id from pdt_category_mst where category_name = #{category}) ) pm_cnt on(1 = 1) where 1 = 1
and pm.category_id = (select id from pdt_category_mst where category_name = #{category})
group by pm.id limit #{index}, 16

SELECT pm.id AS pdt_id, pm.pdt_name, pm.pdt_price, pm.pdt_simple_info, pm.pdt_detail_info, pm.pdt_option_info, pm.pdt_management_info, pm.pdt_shipping_info, pd.id AS pdt_dtl_id, pd.size_id, psm.size_name, pd.pdt_color, pd.pdt_stock, pim.save_name FROM pdt_mst pm LEFT OUTER JOIN pdt_dtl pd ON(pd.pdt_id = pm.id) LEFT OUTER JOIN pdt_size_dtl psd ON(psd.id = pd.size_id) LEFT OUTER JOIN pdt_size_mst psm ON(psm.id = psd.size_id) LEFT OUTER JOIN pdt_image_mst pim ON(pim.pdt_id = pm.id) WHERE pm.id = #{pdtId}

SELECT pd.id AS pdt_dtl_id, pd.pdt_id, pm.pdt_name, pm.pdt_price, pd.pdt_color, pd.size_id, psm.size_name, pim.save_name FROM pdt_dtl pd LEFT OUTER JOIN pdt_mst pm ON(pm.id = pd.pdt_id) LEFT OUTER JOIN pdt_size_dtl psd ON(psd.id = pd.size_id) LEFT OUTER JOIN pdt_size_mst psm ON(psm.id = psd.size_id) LEFT OUTER JOIN pdt_image_mst pim ON(pim.pdt_id = pd.pdt_id) WHERE pd.id = #{pdtDtlId} LIMIT 1
